about_the_game:
Help Dr. Cow complete his experiments, push the box to the switch and open the cage to eat the nutritious bananas.

What is the purpose of Dr. Cow's experiments, why all kinds of strange things happen, and how to push boxes with notepad and search engines, you will find the answer in the game Eat Bananas

Features
  • Gameplay you've never experienced before
  • Lighthearted and fun plot
  • Think outside the box

There will be some "unexpected" situations during the game, please feel free to play, these are also part of the game.The game will not read your personal information, and will not control your computer.

name: 吃香蕉 Eat Bananas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 compatible with at least 500MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Eat Bananas is a puzzle game that requires the use of notepad and search engines. Help Dr. Cow to complete strange experiments and discover the truth behind it!
